caption: This music clip is an instrumental with gamelan instrumental lead along with a hand percussion. The tempo  is medium with melodic sounds and harmony from the striking of metal bowls or plates. The music is soft, melodious, calming, engaging and interesting and sounds a lot like a xylophone.
